headline.main: RED CROSS HOLDS CONFERENCE HERE; Increase in Budget Reported to 2,000 Representatives of 43 Chapters in Region

lead_paragraph: A one-day Red Cross regional conference in the Hotel WaldorfAstoria heard yesterday a message from Queen Elizabeth of England and a declaration that expanded services required by the national defense program had forced up the national budget of the American Red Cross to almost three times last year's figure.
abstract: attends regional conf, N Y C

keywords.name: persons
keywords.value: ELIZABETH, QUEEN OF GT BRIT AND IRELAND

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: ST JOHN OF JERUSALEM, ORDER OF
